long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
━━━

🤔 What's JarGone?  
JarGone makes the web accessible for everyone by breaking down complex language into simple, clear terms. With just one click, it transforms difficult jargon and technical terminology into easy-to-understand text, helping both native and non-native speakers navigate web content more effectively.  

Whether you're reading dense academic texts, complex articles, or highly technical documentation, JarGone makes it all accessible while helping you learn grammar and vocabulary contextually.  

━━━

Key Features  

✨ Instant Simplification  
Click on any text to simplify complex language into clear, concise wording, perfect for improved readability and understanding.  

🛠️ Contextual Word Breakdowns  
Hover over difficult words or phrases to view contextual meanings, grammatical roles, and examples in real time.  

🧠 Learn Vocabulary While You Read  
JarGone helps you grow your vocabulary with contextual explanations and definitions of technical or unfamiliar terms.  

🌍 Multilingual Support  
Choose from multiple languages for simplified text and definitions, making JarGone perfect for non-native speakers or multilingual users.  

🎛️ Customizable User Experience  
- Text Replacement: Opt to simplify text inline or view definitions via tooltips.  
- Language Selection: Translate simplified text and definitions into your preferred language.  
- Coming soon: Choose Chrome's built-in AI when it launches for a keyless, easy experience

━━━

- Students: Struggling with academic texts? JarGone breaks down dense language into simpler terms while teaching you new words.  
- Professionals: Reading industry-specific jargon? JarGone simplifies technical language so you can focus on what matters.  
- Non-Native Speakers: Learning a new language? JarGone makes complex English accessible while helping you build vocabulary and understand grammar.  
- Everyone: From jargon-packed LinkedIn posts to overly complex articles, JarGone makes the web approachable for all.  

━━━

✅ Accessibility for All  
Non-native speakers and readers unfamiliar with technical fields can now understand content seamlessly.  

✅ Vocabulary Building Made Easy  
Contextual meanings and grammar explanations help you expand your vocabulary as you read.  

✅ Tackle Jargon Head-On  
JarGone eliminates frustration caused by dense or inaccessible language, empowering you to learn and engage with content confidently.  

━━━

Additional Features  

- Keyword Extraction: Identify key terms and their grammatical types instantly.  
- Intuitive Design: Minimalistic, interactive interface with a focus on usability and customization.  
- Works Anywhere: Use JarGone on (almost) any website, academic paper, or article. There are some exceptions like here on the Chrome Webstore.  

JarGone is a learning tool at heart. By improving your comprehension and teaching you grammar and vocabulary contextually, it bridges the gap between complex web content and your understanding.  

━━━

📢 Try JarGone Now  
Transform how you read and learn with JarGone! Make complex language a thing of the past.  

━━━

✉️ Get in Touch

We welcome your review and suggestions! But if you'd like to report a bug or get support, here's the dedicated page for that: https://jargone.framer.ai/support
long.zh_CN:
JarGone 通过一键提供清晰、易懂的语言，简化了复杂的术语和技术性语言。

提升非母语人士和母语人士对充满困难和复杂术语的网页内容的可理解性，增强理解能力，同时促进学习。

使用 JarGone，无论是在文章、学术文本，还是任何充满密集语言的网站，您都能更轻松地获取和理解复杂信息。它为您提供了一种无缝且互动的方式，帮助您打破技术术语和复杂词汇所带来的障碍，使网页内容对每个人来说都更加易于接近和包容。

## 解决的问题

*你有没有注意到CEO在LinkedIn上的讲话？*

如今，网络上充满了复杂且难以理解的术语，这对于各种人群来说可能既令人畏惧又令人困惑，从非母语人士到不熟悉某些领域或行业的人。这常常导致误解、错失学习机会以及不必要的挫败感。JarGone通过提供一种简单的方法来澄清困难的文本，使您能够理解并从阅读中学习，从而解决了这一问题。

JarGone 解决了：
- 理解复杂术语的困难：人们在面对技术性或学术性词汇时，经常会遇到阅读理解的障碍。
- 非母语人士的可访问性问题：对于母语人士来说看似简单的单词和短语，可能是说另一种语言的人的重大障碍。
- 缺乏学习词汇的上下文工具：JarGone通过提供清晰的解释和上下文含义，帮助您拓展词汇量。
- 直观且可自定义的用户体验：通过多种设置，如语言选择和文本替换选项，您可以根据个人喜好调整体验。

## 功能特点

- AI驱动的文本简化：只需点击一下，您就能将复杂的文本替换为更简单、更易理解的版本。
- 上下文词汇解析：对于不选择替换文本的用户，JarGone提供上下文提示，解释困难单词或短语的含义。
- 关键词提取：JarGone提取关键术语，并提供其语法类型和含义。
- 多语言支持：选择您偏好的语言，简化后的文本和词汇含义将显示为该语言。
- 可自定义设置：选择是否启用成功时的彩带动画，是否启用文本替换，以及更改简化文本的语言。
